name: Squeaky Squad
description:
Squeaky squad is a Roguelite platformer in which you have to defeat an army of rodents plaguing your ship. Explore 5 various areas in any order you want with their unique quirks and ennemies. Upgrade your character with equipment and weapons to find new ways to fight back the Squeakers.

The Ship: This gigantic procedurally generated labyrinth is composed of 5 unique areas with their unique traps and enemies. From flooded pipelines to factories and aerial decks it will be your choice to go wherever you want first as you can defeat the Squeaky Squad in any order you want.

The Squeakers: These malicious rodents are so well organized they started to become an army equipped with guns, machines and even more... You will have to use any weapon you find to fight back while dodging their traps and surviving wave fights. You may even save some prisoners who will help you out in the ship hub.

The Ship hub: The hub is the best place to find new ways to fight the Squeaky Squad. Use currency kept between your attempts to buy new weapons to be found and upgrade your character with the help of the people you will save along the way.
The Squeaky Squad: They are the leaders of the Squeaker army. You'll have to take them down one by one in each area to hope finding whoever is behind this organization.
